entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley kept shaking hands with people who were obviously very important wizards.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy jumped to his feet so often that he looked as though he were trying to sit on a hedgehog.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge, the Minister of Magic himself, arrived

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: They had met before, and Fudge shook Harry’s hand in a fatherly fashion.

entities.name: bulgarian minister
entities.description: who was wearing splendid robes of black velvet trimmed with gold

relationships.description: Fudge shook Harry’s hand in a fatherly fashion.
he told the Bulgarian minister loudly, ‘Harry Potter, you know’
